properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 9:38PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
Lake effect snow will develop by sunrise as winds turn northwest
off Lake Erie behind low pressure moving across the area. The
snow will continue through much of Thursday before tapering off
Thursday evening as drier air moves in.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to locally 6
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Southern Erie county.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
